data.actual_result: The image uploads without the comment
data.expected_result: The image should upload with the comment like it did in 2.2.5 (3045)
data.short_description: Adding a comment to an image results in the image sending without a comment as of TestFlight 2.2.6 (3349)
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a picture you want to share to the world  - Use the upload arrow and select discord from the list - Select the location you wish to upload the image  - Now type in a comment and tap send
